message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper deals with natural language processing and specifically with paragraph vectors, which are used for text classification and sentiment analysis. 
2. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a novel interpretation for neural-network-based paragraph vectors by developing an unsupervised generative model and performing Bayesian posterior inference. 
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper deals with natural language processing and proposes a probabilistic formulation for paragraph vectors, which can improve performance in supervised learning tasks. 
4. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - Although the paper does not deal with computer vision, the use of neural networks and probabilistic models is relevant to this sub-category. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper deals with text classification and sentiment analysis, which are relevant to information retrieval tasks.
